```{python}
#| output: asis

from helpers.challenger_metadata import CHALLENGERS
from helpers.s3_discovery import discover_challengers

challengers = discover_challengers()

header = "| System | Organisation | Method | Forecast type | Initial conditions | Output resolution | Report |\n"
header += "|--------|--------------|--------|---------------|--------------------|-------------------|--------|\n"

rows = ""
for name in challengers:
    meta = CHALLENGERS.get(name)
    if meta:
        system = f"[{meta['label']}]({meta['url']})"
        org = f"[{meta['organisation']}]({meta['org_url']})"
        method = meta["method"]
        forecast = meta["forecast_type"]
        ic = meta["initial_conditions"]
        res = meta["resolution"]
    else:
        system = name
        org = ""
        method = ""
        forecast = ""
        ic = ""
        res = ""

    report = f"[Report](reports/{name}.report.html)"

    rows += f"| {system} | {org} | {method} | {forecast} | {ic} | {res} | {report} |\n"

print(header + rows)
```
